item.title: Man charged with murder in shooting of Oakland football coach and 'Last Chance U' star John Beam
item.description: A 27-year-old man has been charged with murder in the shooting death of former Oakland football coach John Beam

item.title: 'Charlotte's Web' author's relative upset with use of title in immigration crackdown
item.description: The Trump administration has a name for its immigration sweep in North Carolina’s largest city

item.title: EPA moves to limit scope of clean water law to reduce amount of wetlands it covers
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency says it is redefining the scope of the nation’s bedrock clean water law to limit the amount of wetlands it covers

item.title: Off-duty pilot who tried to cut flight’s engines midair released without prison time
